prompt: An underwater scene with an ancient, ornate crown encrusted with shimmering jewels and surrounded by vibrant corals and exotic marine creatures. The crown rests majestically half-buried in the sandy seabed, with beams of light filtering through the water, illuminating the scene with a mystical glow. The surrounding corals are teeming with colorful fish and sea plants, adding to the fantastical allure of the hidden treasure. The entire scene exudes a sense of mystery and enchantment, inviting viewers into the depths of the colorful underwater world.
